import React, { createContext, useReducer } from 'react';


const initialState = {
    nav: {
        bg: '#7ACCE8',
        logoContainer: '#50A9B7',
        h1: '#3D80A4',
        hamburger: '#5D99C6',
        hamDiv: '#76B8D4',
        links: '#4F8DB3',
        linksPhone: '#60A3C1',
        linkLi: '#8FBFDC',
        linkA: '#396C8C',
        iconContainer: '#5D99C6',
        iconA: '#76B8D4',
        profile: '#A2C6DC',
        pulse: '#58A4C0',
        cart: '#67A8C4',
    },
    landing: {
        bg: '#7ACCE8',
        left: '#5D99C6',
        textLeft: '#3D80A4',
        textLeftSpan: '#50A9B7',
        center: '#FFFFFF',
        shopLink: '#50A9B7',
        centerButtons: '#4F8DB3',
        centerButtonsLink: '#FFFFFF',
        centerButton2: '#396C8C',
        centerButton2Link: '#FFFFFF',
        storeButton: '#50A9B7',
        aboutButton: '#4F8DB3',
        right: '#A4D9E9',
        textRight: '#396C8C',
        textRightSpan: '#50A9B7',
    },
    offeringSchema: {
        bg: 'rgba(122, 204, 232, 0.9)',
        bgHover: 'rgba(122, 204, 232, 1)',
        icon: '#50A9B7',
        iconHover: '#76B8D4',
        title: '#3D80A4',
        description: '#4F8DB3',
        styledLink: '#76B8D4',
        styledLinkHover: '#50A9B7',
    },
    offering: {
        bg: 'rgba(122, 204, 232, 0.8)',
        introduction: 'rgba(122, 204, 232, 0.7)',
        introH1: '#3D80A4',
        introH2: '#50A9B7',
        introP: '#7BAFBC',
        offers: 'rgba(164, 217, 233, 0.03)',
    },
    contact: {
        bg: '#7ACCE8',
        title: '#3D80A4',
        description: '#4F8DB3',
        socialLinks: '#76B8D4',
        socialLink: '#50A9B7',
    },
    clientCounter: {
        bg: 'rgba(122, 204, 232, 0.9)',
        countWrapper: 'rgba(122, 204, 232, 0.8)',
        number: '#50A9B7',
        counter: '#76B8D4',
    },
    about: {
        bg: '#7ACCE8',
        aboutSection: '#A4D9E9',
        aboutSectionH1: '#3D80A4',
        aboutSectionH2: '#50A9B7',
        aboutSectionP: '#7BAFBC',
        faq: '#76B8D4',
        dropdown: '#50A9B7',
        dropdownH1: '#3D80A4',
        answer: '#A4D9E9',
        answerP: '#4F8DB3',
    },
    footer: {
        bg: '#7ACCE8',
        footWrapper: '#7ACCE8',
        section: '#3D80A4',
        companyTitile: '#50A9B7',
        companyDescription: '#7BAFBC',
        sectionTitile: '#4F8DB3',
        styledLink: '#76B8D4',
        finalSection: '#A4D9E9',
        finalText: '#3D80A4',
        finalLink: '#50A9B7',
    },
    register: {
        bg: '#E1F4FB',
        left: '#FFFFFF',
        bigCircleGradient: 'rgba(178, 212, 249, 0.4)',
        bigCircleGradient2: 'rgba(144, 202, 249, 0.2)',
        c1: '#A7D8F7',
        c2: '#7ACCE8',
        c3: '#5D99C6',
        c4: '#396C8C',
        welcome: '#2D73A6',
        description: '#1A237E',
        linktext: '#0D47A1',
        styledLink: '#1976D2',
        right: '#D9F1FC',
        container: '#FFFFFF',
        heading: '#0D47A1',
        input: '#D0E9F7',
        inputBorder: '#A7D8F7',
        inputTextColor: '#396C8C',
        inputShadow: '0 2px 4px rgba(33, 150, 243, 0.2)',
        inputBorderHover: '#396C8C',
        inputHover: '#D9F1FC',
        inputShadowHover: '0 4px 6px rgba(33, 150, 243, 0.2)',
        inputFocus: '#0D47A1',
        registerBtn: '#1976D2',
        registerBtnHover: '#1565C0',
        registerBtnShadow: '#42A5F5',
        registerBtnShadowHover: '#1565C0',
        responseMsg: '#388E3C',
    },
    
    login: {
        bg: '#E1F4FB',
        left: '#FFFFFF',
        bigCircleGradient: 'rgba(178, 212, 249, 0.4)',
        bigCircleGradient2: 'rgba(144, 202, 249, 0.2)',
        c1: '#A7D8F7',
        c2: '#7ACCE8',
        c3: '#5D99C6',
        c4: '#396C8C',
        welcome: '#2D73A6',
        description: '#1A237E',
        linktext: '#0D47A1',
        styledLink: '#1976D2',
        right: '#D9F1FC',
        container: '#FFFFFF',
        heading: '#0D47A1',
        input: '#D0E9F7',
        inputBorder: '#A7D8F7',
        inputTextColor: '#396C8C',
        inputShadow: '0 2px 4px rgba(33, 150, 243, 0.2)',
        inputBorderHover: '#396C8C',
        inputHover: '#D9F1FC',
        inputShadowHover: '0 4px 6px rgba(33, 150, 243, 0.2)',
        inputFocus: '#0D47A1',
        registerBtn: '#1976D2',
        registerBtnHover: '#1565C0',
        registerBtnShadow: '#42A5F5',
        registerBtnShadowHover: '#1565C0',
        responseMsg: '#388E3C',
    },
};



const reducer = (state, action) => {
    switch (action.type) {

        default:
            return state
    }
}

export const colorContext = createContext();
const ColorContextProvider = ({ children }) => {

    const [config, dispatchConfig] = useReducer(reducer, initialState)

    return (
        <colorContext.Provider value={{ config, dispatchConfig }}>
            {children}
        </colorContext.Provider>
    );
};

export default ColorContextProvider;
